Articles.Content:
I've seen the problem mentioned by others, but have never experienced myself...until today.

The vessel's TWR at launch is 2.33. It launched perfectly the first time.  I reverted to adjust (not add) a part and went back to the launchpad.  Upon attempting to launch, it would not budge.  I closed the game and restarted it.  No joy.

For those of you who have experienced this, what did you find was the problem and solution?

thanks

 

EDIT:  Removed Procedural Fairing shell.  It launched fine.

Edited April 29, 2016 by Apollo13
